submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n=len(nums)
        dic=defaultdict(list)
        ar=[]
        for i in range(n//2):
            a=nums[i]
            b=nums[n-1-i]
            d=abs(a-b)
            x=max(a,b,k-a,k-b)
            dic[d].append(x)
            ar.append(x)
        ar.sort()
        ans=n
        for val,lst in dic.items():
            i=bisect_left(ar,val)
            i+=n//2
            for x in lst:
                if x<val:
                    i-=2
                else:
                    i-=1
            ans=min(ans,i)
        return ans
